alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 4:28AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte, southeastern Pittsylvania and Halifax Counties through 500 AM EST... At 427 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Turbeville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Boston... Halifax... Keysville... Virgilina... Turbeville... Ingram... and Redoak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
